timeline.message: [JENKINS-61479] Fix a bug in FingerprintCleanupThread and add tests.

timeline.author: MarkEWaite
MarkEWaite

replies.bodyText: @MarkEWaite IIUC the aReadableFile FileMatcher is present inside Hamcrest Version 2.0 onwards. However, we are using hamcrest-library version 1.3. Should I try upgrading it? Or should I implement a custom Matcher?
replies.author: stellargo

replies.bodyText: should be fine to give it a go at upgrading, I don't remember hitting issues upgrading it elsewhere
replies.author: timja

timeline.message: Upgraded Hamcrest to Version 2.2. Incorporated Hamcrest assertion for FingerprintCleanupThread tests.

timeline.author: daniel-beck

timeline.message: Added hamcrest version as a property

timeline.bodyText: Would it make sense to assert log output here, given what this change does (at least "blocked deletion")?
timeline.author: daniel-beck
